alert.note: Alert for Allegheny (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 6:45AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CENTRAL ALLEGHENY COUNTY... At 642 AM EST, snow showers were located over Ben Avon, or over Ross Township, moving southeast at 25 mph. An area of enhanced snowfall may lead to a breif coating for the morning commute. Gusty winds and moderate snowfall rates may lead to temporary visibility reductions. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Monroeville, McKeesport, Franklin Park, Shaler Township, Plum, West Mifflin, North Side Pittsburgh, Baldwin, Murrysville, Hampton Township, Wilkinsburg, Whitehall, Robinson Township, Munhall, Jefferson Hills, and North Versailles. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 52 and 58. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 62 and 74. Parkway North between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 67 and 84.
